    • produceCookedRecipe

      public void produceCookedRecipe(String recipeId, Boolean isUsingPantry, Double consumedServings, Double leftoverServings) throws PantsNotFoundException
      Takes a recipe and logs the recipe in the food log and pantry
      Parameters:
      recipeId - the id of the recipe
      isUsingPantry - whether pantry ingredients are being used
      consumedServings - the amount of servings being eaten after the recipe is prepared
      leftoverServings - the amount of servings left over after the recipe is made
      Throws:
      PantsNotFoundException
